name: No Signal II - The Fight Has Just Begun
name_original: No Signal II - The Fight Has Just Begun
description:
Desconha (Itch.io): Game Designer, Writer

CazadorImperial (Itch.io): Programmer, Level Designer

marcos-r-s-bravo (GitHub): Pixel Artist, Character Designer

Special thanks to this contributors for the themes and SFX of the game:

Level Theme 1: Setuniman - https://freesound.org/s/165765/
Level Theme 2: Dredile - https://freesound.org/s/241946/
Level Theme 3: PSOVOD - https://freesound.org/s/415186/
SFX: ryansnook - https://freesound.org/s/110115/

By all means this game have a Non-Commercial purpose,
made by college students of Universidade Federal de Itajubá - UNIFEI
members of the extension project of Game Development Dev-U
